Notes

Gatefold sleeve. Includes a download code. Includes printed inner sleeves containing lyrics, credits, artwork and band photo. Silver sticker on shrink wrap. ℗ & © 2015 Alabama Shakes, LLC, under exclusive license to ATO Records, LLC. Mastered at Gateway Mastering Studios, Portland, Maine. All tracks recorded at Sound Emporium, Nashville, TN, except "Over My Head" recorded at United Recording, Los Angeles, CA. All tracks mixed at United Recording, Los Angeles, CA.
